oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Treadwell Tea Party
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: parades; downtown; children; 1960s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A float in a parade in downtown Memphis. A young boy and girl ride in a teacup while boys dressed as bakers lead the way. First Federal Savings can be seen in the background. Note on back reads, "Treadwell - Tea Pary 1963."
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Clemens, Al, Jr.
